title: Victor Vran Patch 2.1.0.4 (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
1. Run "patch_victor_vran_2.1.0.4"
2. Play

Changelog:
GOG bonus items - they are now given the first time the user walks into the hub, once per installation
(not per in-game character), if they haven't already been given (e.g. via the old redeem mechanism).
Recipes are now displayed inside the Transmutation panel
Legendary outfit colorization is not removed when the Outfit's color is changed
Fixed a game freeze when using the mouse control
Fixed camera issue in the Mordra boss fight
